name: NFT Creator Unlimited
description:
Create NFT images with Figma. Basic features but free forever.


IMPORTANT! INSTRUCTIONS

  1. Create ‘components with variations’ for each layer.
  2. Place an instance of it inside a frame.
  3. Select the frame to generate. You would see a max number show
  4. Click ‘Generate’ button!
  5. Have patience. Large sets take a while to generate.


Link to explainer video

https://youtu.be/z7yKp1b3qcA


Link to example File

https://www.figma.com/community/file/1070992991166975010/NFT-Creator-plugin-%3A-How-to-use
